articles.title: England star Saka an injury doubt for Euro 2020 quarter-final against Ukraine - Goal.com
articles.description: The 10 South American countries participating in the 2021 Copa America were split up into two groups of five. The top four in each group advanced to the single-elimination knockout stage, which kicked off with the quarterfinals.
